description:
â—£â—¥  New Syllabus Challenge!

A new series of fun little challenges, levelled from 1 to 10 covering all aspects of fundamental parkour.


ğŸ¯ Level Jump

Jumping Challenge - Broad Jump 2

Demonstrate a good landing on the edge of a curb/wall/block that is over ankle-height, jumping from another wall/block/obstacle of the same height. Jump with both feet at the same time and land both feet at the same time. 

You must jump from a minimum of five heel-to-toe steps or greater. Pace out the distance with your feet before jumping.

You must Land on the ball of the big-toe as the impact point, on the front edge of the landing target.

You must stick the landing, which requires you to have complete control of your balance once you have landed. This also means that after the initial contact of the feet, you cannot shuffle or move them from that point.

A good bend on the ankle, knee and hip where muscle contraction is being used to maintain balance.

You cannot fall forwards or backwards after landing.

You must repeat five times.

-- Rules of Challenge --

Rule 1 description : The height of the wall must be ankle-height or greater.
Rule 2 description : Five steps. 
Rule 3 description : Five repetitions in total.
Rule 4 description : Landing two feet.
Rule 5 description : Takeoff two feet,
Rule 6 description : Finish facing the same direction as your starting direction.
